analyzed: bdag nyid gos dkar po dri ma med pa gyon la byang du kha bltas la zhi ba'i sems bsgoms te /

analyzed: thab khung du bcer la yam shing dri zhim bo dgon par gnas pa'i ba lang gi lci ba sprang rtsi dang mar gyis byugs la bcer /

analyzed: zhi ba'i dgang gzar zlum po yid tsam kha gdengs pa 'khor los mtshan pa'o //

analyzed: dgang blugs gnyis ka'i yu ba srid du chang pa lnga'o //
translated: The handle of both the ladle and the fire spoon is five cubits long.

original: zabs su sor gcig brkos te /
analyzed: zabs su sor gcig brkos te /

original: mthe bong gi san mo la thug pa'i phyed ni mar la'o //
analyzed: mthe bong gi san mo la thug pa'i phyed ni mar la'o //
translated: Half of it reaches the base of the thumb.

original: de bas chung ba tha mar bya'o //
analyzed: de bas chung ba tha mar bya'o //

analyzed: de'i rgyu ni zhi ba dkar po shing dag dri zhim pa'i shing las bya'o //
translated: The material for that is white and fragrant wood.

original: de nas me lha drang srong rid pa spyan drangs te bstims la /
analyzed: de nas me lha drang srong rid pa spyan drangs te bstims la /
translated: Then, having invited the sage, the thin fire god, he dissolves.

analyzed: de nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa' bstims la sreg pa'i sngags ni /

analyzed: ae hye hi ma h'a bh'u ta de bi ra shi dvi dza ba ra ma /

analyzed: gri hi tv'a hu ti ma h'a r'amsmi samnni hi to bha b'a /
translated: grihītvā huta mahā rāṃsmi samprāpta hotu bhava

analyzed: aom aagna ye ha bya ka bya b'a h'a n'a ya sv'a h'a /

analyzed: de ltar me lha spyan drangs la dgang blugs gsum dbul bar bya'o //

original: me lha sreg rdzas dbul ba'i sngags /
analyzed: me lha sreg rdzas dbul ba'i sngags /
translated: The mantra for offering the fire god the burnt offerings:

analyzed: aom aagna ye ha bya ka bya ba h'a na y'a di bya di bya ba ha na ya sv'a h'a /

analyzed: me lha la g-yas su bskor zhing bsang gtor bya'o //

analyzed: mar la sogs pa sreg pa'i sngags ni /

analyzed: bandha bandha ha zhes zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang mngon spyod gsum ka la bya'o //
translated: Bandha bandha ha is for all three: pacifying, increasing, and destroying.

original: byug spos me tog dang / mchod pas mchod /
analyzed: byug spos me tog dang / mchod pas mchod /
translated: Make offerings with incense, flowers, and so forth.

original: de nas yon bdag gi don du gtor ma btang /
analyzed: de nas yon bdag gi don du gtor ma btang /

analyzed: gzhan don du byed na gos dang khrus la sogs pa legs par bya ste /
translated: If you are doing it for the sake of others, do the bathing and so forth well.

original: dga' ston bya'o //
analyzed: dga' ston bya'o //
translated: Have a feast.

original: dmigs pa'i bgegs la sreg blugs kyis legs par mchod la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i bgegs la sreg blugs kyis legs par mchod la /
translated: Make a good offering of burnt offerings to the obstructing spirits of the visualization.

analyzed: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rgyud kyi zhi pa'i mtshan don rdzogs so//
